product_name: WTB Slick Comp Bike Tire - 29 x 2.2
long_description: An all-weather commuter tire for 29 in. wheels, the WTB Slick Comp Tire offers a smooth center for rolling efficiency and deep outer grooves for enhanced control in wet conditions. DNA rubber compound is formulated for high-performance riding with a robust 27tpi casing.
short_description: An all-weather commuter tire for 29 in. wheels, the WTB Slick Comp Tire offers a smooth center for rolling efficiency and deep outer grooves for enhanced control in wet conditions.
